summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; ratifying and confirming the declaration of emergency by the Board of Public Works and actions to vent or abate public hazards arising from the fire at Pier 62 on April 11, 1989; making an appropriation from the Cumulative Reserve Fund, Main Fund for abatement measures and public access improvements at Piers 62 and 63; and declaring an emergency therefor.
